item.title: Britain’s Green (Assisted) Suicide
item.description: The week of December 31, 2024: Net zero Britain, regulation, Bidenomics, and much, much more.

item.title: The Time to Push the Iranian Regime to Collapse Is Now
item.description: The world will be a safer place in the absence of that regime, but only the Iranian people can be the authors of their liberation.

item.title: How Environmentalists Abuse the Endangered Species Act
item.description: The law gives activists enormous power if they can find — or invent — an endangered species.

item.title: Trudeau Brought Woe to Canada
item.description: Nine years of Trudeau have clearly made Canada poorer, weaker, less free, and increasingly dysfunctional.

item.title: The Democrats’ Campaign against the Supreme Court Pauses with a Whimper
item.description: The attacks on the Court are unlikely to end, but everything that’s been tried so far has failed, and the Left knows it.
